cards.D01001.title: Conan Edogawa
cards.D01001.feature:
[Resolution Phase][Case Closed][Sleep]: If your evidence is equal to or greater than the Evidence Level of your Case card, you win the game.

[Assist][Sleep]: Move this card into the FILE area. If you have 7 or more cards in your FILE area, your case becomes Solved.
